headline: Named site but owner and operator unresolved
detail: The site is publicly named by the council but the starter ledger does not yet have a strong owner or operator document trail.
source_title: Joint open letter on Bell Hotel and Phoenix Hotel
notes: This is a publishable transparency gap rather than an allegation.

headline: Trade brand identified but legal operator still unresolved
detail: The site is linked to the Cedar Court Hotels brand but the current operating company is not yet pinned down in the public starter ledger.
source_title: Official Cedar Court Hotels Wakefield page
notes: Keep the public page explicit about brand versus legal entity.

headline: Group owner documented but property vehicle still unresolved
detail: The starter ledger can tie the site to Splendid Hospitality Group but not yet to the exact freehold or property SPV behind the hotel.
source_title: Splendid Hospitality Group acquires the Stanwell Hotel near Heathrow
notes: This is common in hotel ownership structures and should be tracked rather than guessed.

headline: Parliamentary reference without full site corroboration
detail: The site appears in parliamentary material but should not be treated as a fully confirmed current hotel until stronger local or operator evidence exists.
source_title: Written Parliamentary Question referencing Copthorne Hotel
notes: Lower-confidence row kept to make the visibility gap explicit.
